DOC.brief_summary: AMG 479 investigational fully human monoclonal antibody target type 1 insulin-like growth factor receptor ( IGF-1R ) . Signaling IGF-1R play important role regulation cell growth survival . Gemcitabine administer day 1 , 8 15 28 day cycle , AMG 479 placebo administer day 1 15 28 day cycle , administer intravenously . The primary purpose study determine AMG 479 gemcitabine improve overall survival compare placebo gemcitabine .
